Smart Seeker enables the user's browser to search the web. Smart Seeker also shows the current time in 8 different time zones. 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Smart Seeker Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. 

Search results will be provided by Microsoft BING.

Terms & Conditions: https://smartseeker.info/terms.php
